casebody.data:
Certiorari Granted.

(See also No. 202, Misc., supra.) No. 442. No. 512. Cohen, Executrix, et al. v. Beneficial Industrial Loan Corp. et al.; and Beneficial Industrial Loan Corp. v. Smith, U. S. District Judge, et al. Edward J. O’Mara, Charles Hershenstein, Samuel Dreskin and Philip B. Kurland for petitioners in No. 442. John M. Harlan and Charles Danzig for the Beneficial Industrial Loan Corporation, petitioner in No. 512 and respondent in No. 442.

C. A. 3d Cir. Certiorari granted.
